name: Island Adventure (unmagical_magician)
description:
Collect all the island friends so you never have to be alone again.

MOUSE TROUBLES
Once the game has launched, try pressing "P" to bring up the pause menu.  Once that's open, click out of the menu, and the game should have control of your cursor.

I suggest trying the web build first, but if you encounter any problems, there is a desktop build for Windows (tested; working) and Linux (untested) available.

Credits:

  • Music: Happy Summer by Mixaund | https://mixaund.bandcamp.com
  • Quack Sound: Pixabay | https://pixabay.com/sound-effects/075176-duck-quack-40345/
  • Everything Else: Me!

Controls:

  • WASD to move about
  • Mouse to look about
  • P to Pause and bring up settings

Available Settings:

  • Audio level control
  • Camera Sensitivity
  • Fullscreen
